snippet.title: ABI [TRAILER #01] (Grant&Bert Studios)
snippet.description:
Abi is an upcoming 2D adventure puzzle game. Here is the very first animated short we made for the game. Hope you will enjoy it! =)

We call this the "prototype". We made it during our leisure time and thought "what if it can actually be a game?" So yea, here we are. 

More trailers and game plays are coming soon! Stay tuned folks.

Music created by LynneMusic.

(p.s. We tried to give credits to the animator who created the free 2d smoke effects but we couldn't find his/her user name anymore. So if you are the creator of the footages please send us a note, cheers!)

----
Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/ABIindiegame/

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/ABIGameOfficial
